Delivering as-new living over two impeccable levels, this beautiful 4-bedroom residence is near wetlands, parks and walking tracks for effortless family enjoyment. Along with easy access to transport, shops, schools and freeways for the utmost in working-week convenience - this really is the ideal family proposition!
Nestled within the exclusive Range Estate, and providing the perfect base for even the busiest of lifestyles, the home features a choice of sun-filled living areas upstairs and down (including a home theatre) plus a stunning entertainers kitchen with stone benchtops, butlers pantry and premium appliances. Outdoor gatherings are easy thanks to the sheltered alfresco deck and child-friendly back yard whilst also included are ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm and over-sized auto garage with both rear and indoor access.
Energy bills are kept low thanks to double glazing and recycled water which is used throughout the lifestyle-focused Range Estate.
On approx. 540sqm, the home is close to Luther & Oxley colleges, Croydon Primary School, station and shopping destinations and is within easy reach of the Eastlink for a stress-free commute.

Description:
Enviable family entertaining and seclusion
CONTACT AGENT FOR PRIVATE APPOINTMENT
Poised on the high side and set over one glorious level, this extensively renovated clinker brick stunner delivers sensational entertaining at a prime family-oriented address. Beautifully refurbished, the formal living space radiates with views to the Dandenong Ranges adjoining a private relaxation deck. The family/dining domain has been cleverly devised with a chef-quality inspired kitchen boasting waterfall Caesarstone benchtop, 900mm, 5-burner gas cooktop and dual ovens plus a s/s dishwasher and undermount double sinks. A semi butler's pantry, BI table benches and soft-close cabinetry emphasise the quality and convenience of this zone with modern pendant lighting drawing the spaces together. Integrating with an awesome indoor/outdoor room, decked with merbau wideboards and partial open air walls (cafe blind) encouraging a gentle breeze while you unwind and admire the greenery, supervise children or watch a movie in the fully wired potential theatre space with separate bar area and OFP to keep you warm all year long. Family and friends will not want to leave the smorgasbord of entertainment on offer with a decked and fenced swim spa, 2nd outdoor fire, paved alfresco and cubby house with slide and sandpit.
The 3 bedrooms (BIRs) plus a study (4th bed) and 2 bright bathrooms are all set away from the main living and hosting domains, master incl ensuite, fitted WIR and gorgeous garden aspect.
Connected to all your needs from premium kindergartens and schools at Tarralla Kindergarten, Sacred Heart PS, Tinternvale PS, Tintern GS, Luther SC and Aquinas SC. Moments to Eastfield and Railway Avenue shops and eateries, Ringwood East train station. Close to Eastland, Croydon Main Street bars and restaurants, Cheong Reserve and Tarralla Creek Trail. Great proximity to freeway and Eastlink along with the Yarra Valley Region, 1000 Steps and the Dandenong Ranges.
Extra features include hardwood polished floors, GDH, split system heating/cooling, quality blinds, laundry, storage and double carport plus workshop/storage area, ample OSP for trailers/vans/boats and secure gates making the home perfectly safe and private for young families.

Description:
Boundless space and Monastery Ridge allure
CONTACT AGENT FOR PRIVATE APPOINTMENT
Privately set back in arguably one of the most sought-after real estate pockets, this Monastery Ridge precinct home is packaged for unrivalled family living on an expansive and superbly established 1409m2 approx allotment. Expertly rendered and renovated with enchanting botanical gardens that complement every aspect of the home. Multi domains comprise lounge with decorative ceiling rose, pretty cornices and character open fireplace. French windows wrap the open plan family/dining in light-soaked sophistication. Merging with a stand-out kitchen displaying Zimbabwean granite benchtops, pressed metal splashback, double Belling oven with warming tray and 5-gas burner cooktop, dishwasher and a large WI pantry with mini freezer. Enhanced by glass fronted showcase cabinetry and pendant mood lights.
BBQs and all scale celebrations will be a delight with frequenting lorikeets, king parrots and eastern rosellas, as will children's playtime with a commercial grade BI playground for hours of endless fun. The trees are rich with fruit from plums and pears to figs and apple trees plus raised vegetable box garden to enhance your culinary spoils.
Serviced by 3 bedrooms, BIRs, and 2 updated bathrooms, master with triple BIRs and in vogue ensuite with large soaking upright bath, rainfall shower and slick black and white tones, including brilliant white plantation shutters.
Enjoy the sensational space or, in time, extend out or add another level (STCA) in an area that will not be built-up due to the historical significance of this area.
Minutes to boutique cafes and restaurants, buses service each end of the street. Walk to Croydon train station, Ainslie Parklands Primary and minutes to a plethora of other quality education with Luther College, Yarra Valley Grammar, Oxley College and Tintern Grammar easily accessed. Close to Eastland, Mullum Mullum Creek Trail and freeway/Eastlink.
Further additions include hardwood polished floors, hydronic heating, split system heating/cooling, laundry and cabinetry, ducted vacuum system, timber deck, a mud room, storage shed, 8000L combined watertanks, casual domain and front bedroom with external climate control automated metal shutters and a double carport with excellent off-street parking plus storage for boat, trailer, caravan or jet ski.
Become one of the privileged residents in this coveted leafy Monastery Ridge zone!

'Bellbird Cottage', Past, Present & Future Appeal
Welcome to 'Bellbird Cottage' a history rich property that possesses the character of yesteryear, the comforts of today plus a bright future filled with possibilities.

- A weatherboard and cement cast exterior evoke instant charm, as you step through the gable roof entryway.
- Inside, tall ceilings, polished floorboards and radiant natural sunlight emphasise the feeling of space throughout. Evident in the large lounge, connecting dining room and bay window-wrapped family and meals area.
- A contemporary addition, the central kitchen is anchored at the heart of the home; hosting stainless steel appliances, sleek black cabinetry and benchtops.
- Transitioning outside, a covered deck and brick paved alfresco supplies plenty of room for low-key entertaining or special family occasions and overlooks a full-size backyard that children and pets will relish.
- Well accommodating, four bedrooms plus a study with built-in bookshelves are complemented by a bright spa bathroom and powder room. The flexible front room containing external access which would suit home-based business operators. The rear master bedroom boasting its own private breakfast deck.
- Additional features include: two gas log fireplaces and air conditioners, dual storage sheds, generous laundry and linen press storage plus a double carport.
- Set within a quiet no-through road that abuts the Ringwood Golf Course, this unique property is a short walk to buses, reserves, Dandenong Creek Trail and recreational facilities.
- Minutes from excellent schools, EastLink, Eastland plus the local shops, eateries and train stations of Ringwood and Heathmont
